titleStmt.title: A Catalogue of vendible and useful English and Latin books on most subjects and in all volumns will be sold by auction, on Monday next the 18th instant, 1688/9 at the Three Half Moons in St. Pauls Church-yard among the woollen drapers.

notesStmt.note: "Catalogues are Distributed Gratis at Mr. Notts at the Queens Armes in the Pell-Mell, at the Flower de Luce in Little Brittain, and the place of Sale every Afternoon, 1688/9."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
